item.title: [hackthebox.eu] Web Challenge
item.description: #.LIST OF CHALLAGE ID Challgenge Done 1 [30 Points] HDC ‚úÖ 2 [50 Points] I know Mag1k ‚úÖ 3 [70 Points] Grammar ‚úÖ 4 [20 Points] Lernaean ‚úÖ 5 [30 Points] Cartographer ‚úÖ 1.HDC [by Thiseas] Description : We believe a certain individual uses this website for shady business. Can you find out who that is and send him an email to check, using the web site’s functionality?
